name: Test yourself! Take this Hitch Quiz |    Movies

questions.text: The director of 'Hitch' also happened to make such movies as 'Ever After', 'Anna and the King' and 'Sweet Home Alabama'.  What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Andy Tennant.

	Andy Tennant also directed 'Fools Rush In' and 'It Takes Two'.  Tennant has also been known to direct television series, for example 'Parker Lewis Can't Lose'.

questions.text: No 'Hitch' quiz would be complete without mentioning the name of the 'fresh'-faced actor who played the lead character. Who was this 'prince' of an actor?
questions.explanation:
Will Smith.

	Will Smith has certainly made his fair share of box-office smashes, including 'Bad Boys', 'Men in Black' and 'Independence Day', but I think most of his fans will always remember him as the 'Fresh Prince' from his days as a rapper and television idol.

questions.text: Eva Mendes is sweet as the leading lady in this film. What is the first name of the love interest of 'Hitch'?
questions.explanation:
Sara.

	You may recognize Eva Mendes from some of her other films, such as 'Stuck on You', '2 Fast 2 Furious' or 'Once Upon a Time in Mexico'. Her first career feature film was a brief appearance in 'A Night at the Roxbury' in 1998.

questions.text: He may be nicknamed 'Hitch', but he does have a full name.  What is the full name of the main character in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Alex Hitchens.

	Hitch is an apt nickname for Alex Hitchens, after all, his job is as a love consultant, who helps inept men 'hitch up' with the women of their dreams.

questions.text: One of Hitch's greatest challenges comes in the form of Albert, played by actor Kevin James. Albert is an accountant who has fallen in love with a beautiful young woman. What is the lovely lady's name?
questions.explanation:
Allegra Cole.

	Allegra Cole is portrayed by Amber Valletta, whom you might recognize from 'Raising Helen', 'What Lies Beneath' and 'Transporter 2'.  Kevin James has appeared in '50 First Dates' and the TV series 'The King of Queens'.

questions.text: At one point in the movie, we see the Eva Mendes' character watching a movie that could be defined as a 'chick flick'.  Which movie has her in tears?
questions.explanation:
Jerry Maguire.

	Specifically, they show the scene in 'Jerry Maguire' where the Renee Zellweger character says 'You had me at 'hello'.

questions.text: Where does Hitch take Sara during their first date on Sunday morning?
questions.explanation:
Ellis Island.

	Hitch has the brilliant notion that showing Sara her great great grandfather's entry in a ledger on Ellis Island might be a good idea. He doesn't realize that this man is a family embarrassment and is nicknamed the 'Butcher of Cadiz'!

questions.text: During the movie, Albert takes his love interest to watch a sports game. Which professional team do they go and see?
questions.explanation:
New York Knicks.

	Albert and Allegra have front row tickets to watch the Knicks play at Madison Square Garden, thanks to Hitch. During the game, poor clumsy Albert spills mustard on his shirt. Luckily, Allegra thinks that Albert's awkwardness is just so cute.

questions.text: At one point in the film, Hitch teaches Albert one of the key skills he will need in dating. It requires that Albert give 90%, while Hitch gives 10%. What skill is this?
questions.explanation:
Kissing.

	Hitch claims that a man must come 90% of the way during a kiss, leaving a woman with the last 10% of the decision to consummate a date. Unfortunately for Hitch, Albert goes the full 100% during their practice run.

questions.text: Complete Hitch's last line from the film:  'Basic _______, there are none.'
questions.explanation:
Principles.

	'Basic principles, there are none' is the last line from the film, spoken by Hitch. Essentially, he is saying that there are no hard and fast rules for falling in love, it is different every time. I hope you enjoyed this quiz, thank you for playing.
